<nowiki>[[File:IconsPage/IconNote.png]]</nowiki> La versione in '''italiano''' <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu-it.org/NaldiniPaolo|qui]]</nowiki>

I joined Ubuntu on February 2006 with Ubuntu 5.10 "The Breezy Badger".
I immediately created an account on the Italian forum and after a few days I began to give support to people.

After about a year, I obtained <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntuit-members|Ubuntu Italian]]</nowiki> membership.
I joined Ubuntu Italian Promoters Team too, where I'm working to the <nowiki>[[https://blueprints.edge.launchpad.net/ubuntu-it/+spec/stickers-ubuntu|Stickers Project]]</nowiki> and the <nowiki>[[https://blueprints.edge.launchpad.net/ubuntu-it/+spec/cd-ubuntu|Cd Ubuntu Project]]</nowiki>

I started to work on Launchpad too, I focused to help the translation of Ubuntu into Italian language.
